column5: What is water level and water temperature? I read earlier is was around 80 F.  I'll be up the second week of September and wondering if the amount of rain has help cool the water. What are the muskies liking this year? Thanks for any infro.
I sent you a PM hope it helps you boat a couple .
Has anyone stayed at Gypsy Point on Pigeon Lake.  I had a trailer there from 1970 to 1991. I met a lot of nice people over the years.
